Description.Name: Nuclear Fallout
Description.Details: Units in the Desert sink only 85% of their normal Heat. The area has experienced some form of nuclear explosion in the past, still polluted with heavy radiation. All units has heat sink capacity lowered by -12 and take 20% extra damage. Sensors are heavily scrambled by the radiation and only work at 40% capacity. Fire control systems are less efficient, all weapons have -2 accuracy.
